title: Association Between Asthma and Dementia Across Age Groups.
abstract: Current asthma in middle-aged adults was associated with 62% higher dementia odds, suggesting optimal asthma and asthma management may represent potential targets for promoting cognitive health.
clean_text: association between asthma and dementia across age groups current asthma in middle aged adults was associated with higher dementia odds suggesting optimal asthma and asthma management may represent potential targets for promoting cognitive health
